Class AdjustablePolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • udel.GardenProject.plotObjects.polygons.AdjustablePolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AdjustablePolygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Arbitrary polygon that can be moved around within a Scene.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdjustablePolygon

        public AdjustablePolygon(javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                         javafx.scene.paint.Color anchorColor,
                         double startx,
                         double starty,
                         double height,
                         double width)
        Constructor. Represent an object on a plot in PlotDesign with an arbitrary amount of points, each editable.
        Parameters:
        color - Background color of the polygon.
        anchorColor - Color of the anchors.
        startx - Starting horizontal position.
        starty - Starting vertical position.
        height - Height of the polygon
        width - Width of the polygon

        public boolean isPointInPolygon(double x,
                                double y)
        Determines if a double point specified by an X and Y is within this polygon.
        Parameters:
        x - Horizontal position as a double.
        y - Vertical position as a double.
        Returns:
        True if the point is within this polygon, false if not.
